}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Amlogic]] A113X @1.3GHz :Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A53)​ *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 512MB SLC NAND Flash *WLAN: 1x1 MIMO 802.11abgn+ac 2.4/5GHz Wi-Fi *USB: 1x Type-A Charging Port *Power: Power Source: 12V via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.pcmag.com/reviews/lenovo-smart-clock-essential ''Lenovo Smart Clock Essential Review'' on '''PC Mag'''] *[https://www.theverge.com/2020/11/8/21553993/lenovo-smart-clock-essential-smart-alarm-clock-review-price-specs-features ''Lenovo’s Smart Clock Essential is a slightly smarter bedside clock'' on '''The Verge''']
